lines.text: create integers c , v0 , v1 , a , l
lines.code: int c , v0 , v1 , a , l ;

lines.text: read c read v0 read v1 read a read l
create integers sumd , hred , with sumd = 0 , hred = 0
while c is greater than hred
increment hred by minimum of ( v1 and v0 + a * sumd ) - l
lines.code: hred += min ( v1 , v0 + a * sumd ) - l ;

lines.text: if sumd is 0 , increment hred by l
